thread.title: Drake put in 'Work' for his birthday message to Rihanna
thread.title_full: Drake put in 'Work' for his birthday message to Rihanna

author: Kayla Bazile
title: Drake put in 'Work' for his birthday message to Rihanna
text:
If only we could all be so lucky as to have Drake love us.
While performing a concert in Dublin Monday night, the Canadian rapper took time to shout out his love for Rihanna on her 29th birthday. Even though the pair spilt up months ago and Drake has recently been linked to Jennifer Lopez , there is obviously no love loss between the two exes.
SEE ALSO: Apparently Drake stepped up to offer a man help during a police incident
A fan filmed the sweet moment in which Drake told the crowd it was someone's birthday that he "has a lot of love and respect for." And then, instead of singing the traditional "Happy Birthday" song, Drizzy decided to have the crowd sing Rihanna's part of their joint song "Work". A .
Drake Wishes Rihanna A Happy Birthday... pic.twitter.com/bypdxxBT7o
â€” Rambo ðŸ…´ (@xDrakeFam) February 21, 2017
These two are the true definition of #exgoals.
BONUS: Drake gushes over Rihanna at the VMAs and social media is totally embarrassed for him
